text: Alan Weir (born 1 September 1959) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:People from South Shields Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Rochdale A.F.C. players Category:Hartlepool United F.C. players Category:Whitley Bay F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Alan Weir
